name: FHIRIGANCSatusehatR4
title: FHIR IG ANC Satusehat R4
description: FHIR IG for SATUSEHAT Antenatal Care (Draft)

resource.name: Administrative Code
resource.description: The administrative code of the address, represented in six levels: province, city/regency, district, village, rt and rw.

resource.name: ANC Code Systems ValueSet
resource.description: A ValueSet that includes codes from multiple CodeSystems used in ANC and related implementations.

resource.name: ANC Scenario-Custom-Code
resource.description: A collection of codes used in thesis scenario for referral of pre-eclampsia patient.

resource.name: Antenatal Care Encounter
resource.description: An interaction between a pregnant individual and a healthcare provider for the purpose of conducting antenatal assessments, providing maternal and fetal health services, and ensuring continuity of care throughout pregnancy. This includes routine check-ups, screenings, interventions, and counseling as part of comprehensive antenatal care.

resource.name: Birth Place
resource.description: The registered place of birth of the patient. A sytem may use the address.text if they don't store the birthPlace address in discrete elements.

resource.name: Episode of Care: Antenatal Care
resource.description: Represents the period of antenatal care management for a patient, linking them to a healthcare provider or organization. This period covers multiple encounters related to maternal and fetal.

resource.name: Extended Codes CodeSystem
resource.description: Set of WHO-Custom-ANC codes adapted in the implementation guide

resource.name: Location Codes
resource.description: Codes representing different healthcare facilities and service locations.

resource.name: Primary Care Lab Parameter Code
resource.description: List of LOINC code used in laboratory system based on Jakarta master data

resource.name: Primary Care Lab Value Code
resource.description: List of observation code used in laboratory result value based on Jakarta master data

resource.name: SATUSEHAT Codes CodeSystem
resource.description: Set of codes representing SATUSEHAT concepts used in the implementation guide

resource.name: Service Request Codes
resource.description: Codes for various types of service requests, including diagnostics, procedures, and referrals.
